raw: Norway became one of the first European countries on Wednesday to consider banning banks from paying dividends , as the coronavirus outbreak thrusts the globe into crisis .
replaced: Norway became one of the first European countries on Wednesday to consider banning banks from paying dividends , as The coronavirus outbreak thrusts the globe into crisis .

raw: In a proposal to the finance ministry , Norway ’s Financial Supervisory Authority said the country ’s banks and insurers should not be allowed to pay dividends for now given the grave consequences of the outbreak .
replaced: In the proposal , Norway  Norway ’s Financial Supervisory Authority said Norway ’s banks and insurers should not be allowed to pay dividends for now given the grave consequences of The coronavirus outbreak .

raw: The Norwegian regulator ’s move puts it at the forefront of action taken elsewhere in Europe .
replaced: The Norwegian regulator ’s move puts Norway ’s Financial Supervisory Authority at the forefront of action taken elsewhere in Europe .

raw: Earlier in the week , Germany ’s financial watchdog urged banks to refrain from share buybacks and think twice before paying dividends and bonuses .
replaced: Earlier in Last week , Germany ’s financial watchdog urged banks to refrain from share buybacks and think twice before paying dividends and bonuses .

raw: There have been similar calls from officials in Sweden and France .
replaced: There have been similar calls from officials in Sweden and France .

raw: European regulators have recently loosened rules to make it easier for banks to lend to avoid a collapse of the economy , but they want to prevent the money , which ultimately comes from taxpayers , ends up in the pockets of shareholders or bankers .
replaced: European regulators have recently loosened rules to make it easier for banks to lend to avoid a collapse of the economy , but European regulators want to prevent the money , which ultimately comes from taxpayers , ends up in the pockets of shareholders or bankers .

raw: “ In this critical situation , taxpayers ’ money is meant to support our health systems and the real economy and not to rescue again carelessly acting banks , ” said Sven Giegold , a German member of the European parliament .
replaced: “ In this critical situation , taxpayers ’ money is meant to support our health systems and the real economy and not to rescue again carelessly acting banks , ” said Sven Giegold , a German member of the European parliament .

raw: The European Central Bank , which has said it will buy more than 1 trillion euros in bonds and provide cheap financing to banks to fund companies , also expects banks to make “ prudent decisions ” on payouts .

raw: Last week , a group of former senior regulators said in a statement to G20 finance ministers and central bankers that commercial lenders should immediately halt share buybacks , dividends and most staff bonuses to bolster their capital and their capacity to lend to the real economy .
replaced: Last week , The regulator said in a statement to G20 finance ministers and central bankers that commercial lenders should immediately halt share buybacks , dividends and most staff bonuses to bolster commercial lenders capital and commercial lenders capacity to lend to the real economy .

raw: In making its recommendation , Norway ’s FSA said banks could face significant losses due to the outbreak , while insurers risk lower income due to a fall in interest rates and could also see a drop in asset values .
replaced: In making The regulator recommendation , The regulator said banks could face significant losses due to The coronavirus outbreak , while insurers risk lower income due to a fall in interest rates and could also see a drop in asset values .

raw: A decision on whether to allow dividend payments to be made for the 2019 fiscal year will be made “ as soon as possible ” , a finance ministry spokesman told Reuters .

raw: The financial industry lobby group , however , said the ministry should reject the proposal .
replaced: The regulator , however , said The regulator should reject the proposal .

raw: Most banks have proposed payments for 2019 and are due to hold shareholder meetings in coming weeks to approve the plans .
replaced: Most banks have proposed payments for 2019 and are due to hold shareholder meetings in coming weeks to approve the plans .

raw: The regulator has previously urged banks to reconsider dividend payments and buybacks .
replaced: The regulator has previously urged banks to reconsider dividend payments and buybacks .

replaced: The coronavirus outbreak has already taken a heavy toll on Norway , with unemployment rising fivefold in recent weeks to unemployment highest level since the 1930s .
